name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.17.0-f5c8762ce1c804bc8ee8db6317dd2cc308bf7bd8 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
